links.title: BlackBerry races ahead of security curve with quantum-resistant solution
links.description: Quantum computing represents tremendous promise to completely alter technology as we've known it, allowing operations that weren't previously possible with traditional computing. The downside of these powerful machines is that they could be strong enough to break conventional cryptography schemes. Today, BlackBerry announced a new quantum-resistant code signing service to help battle that possibility.

links.title: Facebook reportedly looking to acquire a cybersecurity firm in the wake of its most recent hack
links.description: Facebook is in the market for cybersecurity help. The Information reported this weekend that the social network giant is looking to acquire a cybersecurity firm, likely to gain key security talent and to serve as a positive public relations move.

messages.body: Apple Again Top-Performing Dow Stock, but Merck Is Closing In $DJIA $AAPL $MRK $MSFT $PFE $V http://bit.ly/2NYzcNs

links.title: Apple Again Top-Performing Dow Stock, but Merck Is Closing In
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) returned last week as the Dow Jones industrial average's best stock for the year to date for the third consecutive time. Even though the company's shares dropped about 1.3% last week, the world's most valuable company has still managed to post a year-to-date share price gain of 29.6%.
